MIME element (text/plain)
Re:  DMCA Copyright Infringement 
 
 
Dear Administrator, 
 
I represent Gawker Media, LLC who has authorized me to act on its behalf
for copyright infringement notification. 
 
Infringement of dozens of Gawker Media copyrighed articles (the
"articles") have been detected on the Web site http://uksexblog.co.uk/.
They are exact copies of the articles appearing at the web site
http://www.fleshbot.com. Among the infringing articles appear on the Web
sites as follows: 
 
http://uksexblog.co.uk/fusker-bytes.html
http://uksexblog.co.uk/johnny-hazzard-for-heatherette.html
http://uksexblog.co.uk/youtube-watch-aaron-shea.html
http://uksexblog.co.uk/meet-angellore.html 
 
This letter is an official notification under the provisions of Section
512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of the
detected infringement.  I hereby request that you IMMEDIATELY issue a
cancel message, as specified in RFC 1036, for the specified posting and
prevent the infringer, who is identified by its Web address, from
posting the infringing articles to your servers in the future.  Please
be advised that by law, as a service provider, you must "expeditiously
remove or disable access to" the infringing articles upon receiving this
notice.  Noncompliance may result in a loss of the possibility of
immunity under the DMCA. 
 
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not 
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.   The 
information provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge. 
I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on
behalf of Gawker Media, LLC for matters pertaining to notification of
infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted material. 
 
You are hereby put on notice that the photographs must be removed from
http://uksexblog.co.uk/ immediately. Please confirm by email or
telephone that you have complied with your obligations under the Act by
removing the photographs from http://uksexblog.co.uk/. 
 
Please respond by email to me at scott@gawker.com a prompt response
indicating the actions you have taken to resolve this matter. 
 
 
Very truly yours, 
 
 
Scott Kidder 
 
--
Scott Kidder
Gawker Media
phone 212.655.9524 x405
fax 443.269.0582 
 
Gawker * Wonkette * Defamer * Idolator
Gizmodo * Fleshbot * Jalopnik * Kotaku
Gridskipper * Kinja * Lifehacker * Valleywag
